inbodydescription.para: < This value is undefined in the protocol. Should best be zero when getting the headers since there is not supposed to be any transactions. Would have probably been better if the var int was dropped completely for headers only.

briefdescription.para: Get the hash of the Block.

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves or calculates the hash for a block. Hashes taken from this function are cached.

parameterdescription.para: The Block object. This should be serialised.

simplesect.para: The hash for the block. This is a 32 byte long, double SHA-256 hash and is a pointer to the hash field in the block.

briefdescription.para: Serializes a Block to the byte data.

parameterdescription.para: If true serialize transactions. If false there do not serialize for transactions.

simplesect.para: The length read on success, 0 on failure.

briefdescription.para: This file defines a bitcoin block.

detaileddescription.para: Blocks contain transaction information and use a proof of work system to show that they are legitimate.
